briefdescription.para: This function is executed in case of error occurrence.
This function is default RTC wake-up timer interrupt handler.

detaileddescription.para: When wake-up interrupt occurs, both pfUpdateTimeCallBack and pfWakeUpTimerCallBack callback function will be called. The first one is intended to treat the time update (time management). The second one is free to be used.

briefdescription.para: This function setup the RTC clock.
This function setup the RTC divider.
This function write to backup register.

parameterdescription.para: The backup register numbre to write

briefdescription.para: This function read from backup register.

parameterdescription.para: The backup register numbre to read from

briefdescription.para: This function set the current time.

parameterdescription.para: The current time to set (in epoch)

briefdescription.para: This function read the current time.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer on timeval structure to hold the read time

briefdescription.para: This function get the millisecond epoch time.
This function get the epoch time.
This function update the RTC clock with summer/winter time.
This function force the RTC wake-up interrupt (in one second)
This function is not implemented.
This function set the callback for "time changed".
This function enable the RTC wake-up timer.
This function disable the RTC wake-up timer.
This function reload the RTC wake-up timer to the next wake-up event (i.e. the next midnight)
This function set the callback for the wake-up timer event.
This function set the RTC wake-up timer interrupt handler.
This function start the given alarm.

parameterdescription.para: The elapse time in second before alarm occurs

briefdescription.para: This function start the given alarm at milisecond scale.

parameterdescription.para: The elapse time in millisecond before alarm occurs

briefdescription.para: This function stop the given alarm.
This function set the alarm interrupt handler.
This file contains functions to deal with RTC (Time, Wake-up, Alarm).
